column4: BRIEF-Tesla Motors Inc Q1 NON-GAAP net loss $0.57 per share

column4: Two Tesla executives leaving ahead of Model 3 ramp-up
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Two top manufacturing executives are leaving Tesla Motors Inc  as the Silicon Valley electric-car maker prepares to launch its first mass-market car  the Model 3  and sharply ramp up production.
